/** * A builder for immutable range maps. Overlapping ranges are prohibited. */

Comparable <
?
>
,
V

RangeSet <
K

private final

()

Range <
K
>
,
V
>
entry :
rangeMap. asMapOfRanges
()
.
entrySet ()
) {
Range <
K
>
key =
entry. getKey
()

if (
key. isConnected
(
range

&& !

(
range
)
.
isEmpty ()
)
{ throw new
IllegalArgumentException (
"Overlapping ranges: range " + range + " overlaps with entry " + entry
)
;
}
}
}
keyRanges. add
(
range
)
;
rangeMap. put
(
range
,
value
)
;

this
;
